statements: SELECT * FROM job_tracking WHERE job_id = 100;
SELECT job_title, company_name, application_date FROM job_tracking WHERE company_name = 'Google';
SELECT * FROM job_tracking WHERE offer_received = TRUE;
SELECT job_title, company_name, interview_date FROM job_tracking WHERE application_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT job_id, company_name FROM job_tracking WHERE company_name LIKE '%Microsoft%';
SELECT job_title, company_name FROM job_tracking WHERE offer_received = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM job_tracking WHERE application_date >= '2022-01-01' AND interview_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT job_id, job_title, company_name FROM job_tracking ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_jobs FROM job_tracking WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT job_title, application_date FROM job_tracking WHERE offer_received = FALSE ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM job_applications
SELECT job_title, company FROM job_applications WHERE application_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT application_id, job_title, company, application_date FROM job_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT job_title, COUNT(*) AS total_applications FROM job_applications GROUP BY job_title HAVING total_applications > 1
SELECT application_id, job_title, company, application_date, interviewer FROM job_applications LEFT JOIN interviews ON job_applications.application_id = interviews.application_id
SELECT * FROM job_applications WHERE job_title = 'Software Engineer';
SELECT job_title, company FROM job_applications WHERE application_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT application_id, job_title, company, application_date FROM job_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT company, COUNT(application_id) AS application_count FROM job_applications GROUP BY company HAVING COUNT(application_id) > 1;

SELECT interviews.interview_id, job_applications.job_title, interviews.interview_date, interviews.interviewer FROM interviews INNER JOIN job_applications ON interviews.application_id = job_applications.application_id ORDER BY interviews.interview_date ASC;
SELECT application_id, job_title, company_name, application_date FROM job_applications;
SELECT * FROM job_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, job_title FROM job_applications WHERE application_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT offer_id, application_id, offer_date, salary FROM job_offers WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT application_id, job_title, company_name, application_date FROM job_applications WHERE company_name = 'ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM job_applications WHERE job_title = 'Software Engineer'
SELECT job_title, company_name, application_date FROM job_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC
SELECT * FROM job_applications WHERE job_title = 'Project Manager' AND company_name = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT job_title, company_name, application_date FROM job_applications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT job_offers.offer_id, job_offers.salary, job_applications.job_title FROM job_offers INNER JOIN job_applications ON job_offers.application_id = job_applications.application_id ORDER BY job_offers.salary DESC
SELECT * FROM job_seekers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM job_seekers WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT job_seeker_id, count(*) FROM job_applications GROUP BY job_seeker_id;
SELECT * FROM interviews ORDER BY interview_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, status FROM job_applications WHERE position_applied = 'Software Engineer' AND status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM job_seekers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM job_seekers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%111%';
SELECT application_date AS date, position_applied AS position FROM job_applications WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT j.full_name AS name, i.interview_date AS date, i.interviewer FROM job_seekers j JOIN job_applications a ON j.job_seeker_id = a.job_seeker_id JOIN interviews i ON a.application_id = i.application_id WHERE i.interview_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM job_offers WHERE salary > 80000 ORDER BY salary DESC, offer_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM job_applications;
SELECT job_title, company, application_date FROM job_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT id, job_title, company FROM job_applications WHERE company = 'Google';
SELECT application_id, interview_date, interview_type FROM interviews WHERE interview_type = 'Final Round';
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM job_seekers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM job_seekers;
SELECT name, email FROM job_seekers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT job_title, company FROM job_history WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM job_applications WHERE company = 'Google';
SELECT job_title, application_date FROM job_applications WHERE application_date > '2022-05-01' ORDER BY application_date ASC;
